A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible. Just Awful.  Kathleen Kenedy and her lapdog\, Rian Johnson produced a film that took its pants down and defecated on 40 years of fond memories for countless people. After this train wreck of a movie\, and for the first time ever\, I no longer care about what happens to the Star Wars universe moving forward. Last Jedi (Over 40) indeed.
